The TV explains as the staffs prepare you in the tracking suit and start up the robot.
"We're trying to make a robot that can work in movement ranges like humans.
If we're successful, we might be able to replace them as stunts in movies. We're still short on funds though, so your support helps us go a long way."
...And you're ready to try it out!

like twisting your arms, bending, and trying out poses.
on a closer inspection, they even track flexing, impressive!
You then start pulling out the big guns
A back flip
Front flip
And a mid-air spin!
The suit didn't break, and the robot landed perfectly!
The festival is closing, and it's time to leave.
You went back the way you came,
And once you're home,
It's time for dinner!

There's a virtual game set up to the right. It's a gun game, in a virtual environment. There's a robotic contest going on,\nbut it was so crowded you barely get anything out of it.\nWe may have to watch it later online.
